hero.headline: Discover Our App
hero.subheadline: The best app for all your needs.

features.title: Budget Tracking
features.description: Easily monitor and categorize your spending to stay on budget.

features.title: Savings Goals
features.description: Set and track your savings goals to achieve financial milestones faster.

features.title: Investment Insights
features.description: Get personalized investment advice to grow your wealth.

features.title: Bill Reminders
features.description: Never miss a bill payment with timely reminders.

testimonials.title: Impressed New User
testimonials.name: Alicia Jones (32, Marketing Manager)
testimonials.feedback: I wasn't sure this budgeting app would work for me, but it's been amazing!  I've finally gotten a handle on my spending and even started saving for a vacation. Definitely recommend!

testimonials.title: Investment Enthusiast
testimonials.name: Robert Smith (55, Software Engineer)
testimonials.feedback: The investment insights in this app are incredible! It's like having a financial advisor in my pocket. I feel much more confident about my long-term financial goals now. Thanks!

testimonials.title: Peace of Mind with Reminders
testimonials.name: Carolyn White (42, Teacher)
testimonials.feedback: Honestly, these bill reminders are a lifesaver!  I used to miss payments all the time, but this app keeps me on track. Plus, it helps me stay organized with my finances overall.  Love it!

testimonials.title: Budgeting Made Simple
testimonials.name: David Brown (28, Entrepreneur)
testimonials.feedback: Budgeting used to be such a chore, but this app makes it a breeze. Everything is so clear and easy to use.  I can finally see exactly where my money is going, and it's helped me make some smart adjustments.  Highly recommend!
